text: ➡️Listen to what Allyson Auge has to say about why she needs a #COVID19 #vaccine. She's telling her story today to help other people from #WNY who are immuno-compromised get vaccinated. She made an appointment in PA no problem. Watch @wgrz at 6 today for Allyson's story! https://t.co/e4CIj4dcwJ
